name: In re Nomination Petition of J. Richard LYNCH, Republican Candidate for Lieutenant Governor. Appeal of J. Richard LYNCH

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of May, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court of Pennsylvania is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 906
In re Nomination Petition of J. Richard LYNCH, Republican Candidate for Lieutenant Governor. Appeal of J. Richard LYNCH.
